title: WTB: Rare back Boston Red Sox - BL, Drum, Lenox, CB
author: AGuinness

posts.post_title: WTB: Rare back Boston Red Sox - BL, Drum, Lenox, CB
posts.post_content:
My T206 project marches forward, and rather than list possible front/back combos I'm looking for, I'm going to throw this out and see what comes up.
I'd be interested in any Boston Red Sox players (including Frank Smith and Kleinow) with a rare back - including Lenox, Broad Leaf, Drum, Uzit, Hindu, Carolina Brights, Cycle, EPDG, American Beauty.
I'd prefer graded by SGC, but other slabs (PSA, BVG) or raw would certainly be considered!
I already have a Speaker.
PM or email works. Thanks for looking.

This worked last week, still looking and hopefully another one will become available!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Still looking, thanks.

Are you looking for any blank backs? If you are I have a Stahl.[/QUOTE]



I’d be interested to see it, although blanks aren’t a big a focus as Drum, Lenox, Uzit, CB, BL, etc.

Thanks for posting, although that is one front/back combo that I actually have.

Still working on this, thanks for all the looks and offers. If any more are out there, I’d love to hear about them!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Any rare backed Red Sox that might be available? Maybe my search will share in some of the success that the Beantown Boys are also enjoying right now...

Just added another nice card, thanks to this board, but the search continues! Any more rare backed Red Sox out there that people could part with?
Thanks!
The search continues, any more out there? Thanks!

Still looking for some rare backs. Anybody have one they’d be willing to part with?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Got some cash money ready to roll on this, anybody got one I can pry loose?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Thanksgiving Eve bump - still looking! Happy Turkey Day to all!
If you've got a Red Sox T206 with a rare back, I'd love to hear from you. Thanks for all the consideration!

Another piece to the puzzle arrived yesterday and I've got a great start to this project. But to complete it, I'm going to need to focus on getting a couple of the very rare backs. I'd still love to hear about other backs that are available, but I'm especially interested in finding a couple examples with these backs (front subject does not matter at this point, just depicting a member of the Red Sox):

Lenox
Broad Leaf
Drum
Uzit
Carolina Brights

Thanks to everyone who has responded! I know these backs are extremely tough to find, but I'm hopeful that one or two will pop up soon!

Really enjoying doing this project and the people who have reached out and who I've dealt with - thanks all! And Uzit is now spoken for, so I'm in the market for the other rare backed Red Sox. I'd love to land a card or two with one of these backs (and if there are any other mid-scarcity backs, I'd be interested in those, too):

Lenox
Broad Leaf
Drum
Carolina Brights

[quote name="AGuinness" post=1844364]Lenox
Broad Leaf
Drum
Carolina Brights[/QUOTE]

In a perfect world, I'm three cards away from completing this project and that includes "just" two of the above. I'm in it for the long haul, but if anybody has a Red Sox player with one of these backs they'd part with, I'd love to check one off sooner.
Still looking, hoping one will shake loose. PM or email me if you've got one of these beauties you'd part with.

My 8-year-old asks some good questions about my baseball cards, including about this T206 project. I tried to explain in logic for his age about the how  many examples of the possible front-back combos that might be out there for the remaining cards. I figured there are a few hundred, maybe.
Bump - still looking for rare backed Red Sox T206! Thanks for looking!

Still looking! Please reach out if you have something available!
